item.title: Raspberry Pi Setup Without Keyboard
item.description: So the world has been hit with this awful pandemic and I could easily descend into the depth of depression. However I made myself a promise - I would constantly look at ways to be creative, get this blog live is one of those projects. Alongside this though I want to make a dress, make ramen from scratch and something technical. This is where my journey with the raspberry pi starts.
